query.statement: SELECT '0' AS CHECK , MM013C.POSID1 AS POSID , MAX(MM013C.POST1) AS POST1 , (SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LANG = #G_LANG# AND CODE1 = '10' AND CODE2 = MAX(MM013C.EKGRP)) AS EKGRP , MAX(MM013C.NAME1) AS NAME1 , SAPHEE.GET_CURRDATA(MAX(MM013C.WAERS),SUM(MM013C.NETPR*MM013C.MENGE)) AS NETPR , SUM(MM013C.MENGE) AS MENGE , MAX(MM013C.WAERS) AS WAERS , MAX(MM013C.WERKS) AS WERKS , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MIN(MM013C.SDATE)) AS SDATE , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MIN(MM013C.STIME)) AS STIME , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MIN(MM013C.DDATE)) AS DDATE , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MIN(MM013C.DTIME)) AS DTIME , MAX(MM013C.STATE) AS STATE , SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(MM013C.MANDT, MAX(MM013C.LIFNR)) AS RV_NAME , MM013C.MATNR AS MATNR , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(UDATE) AS UDATE , MAX(MM013C.BIGO) AS BIGO , MAX(MM013C.GEOSAN) AS GEOSAN , -- NC현장 PRPS 테이블 참조로 변경 2015.08.27 조영욱 -- NC현장 기계실 출하일만 가져오도록 변경 2015.10.14 조영욱 CASE WHEN MAX(MM013C.EXTWG) IS NULL OR MAX(MM013C.EXTWG) = '' OR (MAX(MM013C.BOX_CK) = '' AND MAX(MM013C.EXTWG)='BOX33') OR (MAX(MM013C.BOX_CK) = '24' AND MAX(MM013C.EXTWG) = 'BOX24') THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT1) IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(MM013C.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE '00000000' END) WHEN MAX(MM011.BLOCK_NO) = '' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(MM013C.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT2) END) WHEN MAX(MM011.BLOCK_NO) LIKE 'A%' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(MM013C.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT1) END) WHEN MAX(MM011.BLOCK_NO) LIKE 'B%' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(MM013C.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT2) END) WHEN MAX(MM011.BLOCK_NO) LIKE 'C%' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(MM013C.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT3) END) WHEN MAX(MM011.BLOCK_NO) LIKE 'D%' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(MM013C.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT4) END) WHEN MAX(MM011.BLOCK_NO) LIKE 'E%' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(MM013C.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT5) END) ELSE '00000000' END) ELSE (CASE ( CASE WHEN MAX(MM013C.BOX_CK) = '24' THEN (SELECT VALUE(SUBSTR(BLOCK,1,1),'') FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT026_1 WHERE MANDT= MM013C.MANDT AND BOXNO = MAX(MM013C.EXTWG)) ELSE (SELECT VALUE(SUBSTR(BLOCK,1,1),'') FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT026 WHERE MANDT= MM013C.MANDT AND BOXNO = MAX(MM013C.EXTWG)) END ) WHEN '1' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(MM013C.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT1) END) WHEN '2' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(MM013C.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT2) END) WHEN '3' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(MM013C.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT3) END) WHEN '4' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(MM013C.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT4) END) WHEN '5' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(MM013C.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT5) END) ELSE '00000000' END) END AS SHIPDAT , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MAX(MM013C.POSID),7,2) IN ('NB','NS','NC') THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS MISU_GUBN , MAX(MM013C.EKGRP) AS EKGRP2 FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MM013B.POSID,1,2) = 'QM' THEN SUBSTR(MM013B.POSID,1,8) WHEN SUBSTR(MM013B.POSID,1,1) = 'Q' THEN SUBSTR(MM013B.POSID,1,7) ELSE SUBSTR(MM013B.POSID,1,6) END AS POSID1 , MM013B.POSID AS POSID , MM013B.POST1 AS POST1 , MM013B.EKGRP AS EKGRP , MM013B.LNAME AS NAME1 , MM013B.LIFNR AS LIFNR , MM013B.MATNR AS MATNR , VALUE(MM017A.MENGE, 0) AS MENGE , MM013B.MEINS AS MEINS , MM013B.EINDT AS EINDT , MM013B.NETPR AS NETPR , MM013B.WAERS AS WAERS , MM013B.WERKS AS WERKS , MM013B.EXTWG AS EXTWG , MM013B.BOX_CK AS BOX_CK , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013B.UDATE) AS UDATE , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013B.SDATE) AS SDATE , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013B.STIME) AS STIME , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013B.DDATE) AS DDATE , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013B.DTIME) AS DTIME , MM013B.STATE AS STATE , MM013B.MANDT AS MANDT , VALUE(MM017A.PRO_F, '10') AS PRO_F , CASE WHEN (MM013B.WERKS <> '2000' AND SAPHEE.GET_JAJEA_BALJU(MM013B.MANDT, MM013B.POSID,MM013B.MATNR) < 0) THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS BIGO -- ,'0' AS BIGO , CASE WHEN VALUE(M82.POSID,'') > '' THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END AS GEOSAN FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT013_M AS MM013B LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MM017.MANDT , MM017.EBELN , MM017.EBELP , COALESCE(SUM(MM017.MENGE),0) AS MENGE , MAX(INVNR) AS INVNR , MAX(INVITEM) AS INVITEM , MIN(PRO_F)AS PRO_F , MAX(DDATE) AS DDATE FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT017_M AS MM017 WHERE MM017.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM017.LIFNR = #LIFNR# AND MM017.INVNR = #INVNR# AND MM017.PRO_F >= '1' AND MM017.POTYPE = '' GROUP BY MM017.MANDT,MM017.EBELN,MM017.EBELP) AS MM017A ON MM013B.MANDT = MM017A.MANDT AND MM013B.EBELN = MM017A.EBELN AND MM013B.EBELP = MM017A.EBELP LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT082 AS M82 ON M82.MANDT = MM013B.MANDT AND M82.POSID = MM013B.POSID WHERE MM013B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM013B.LIFNR = #G_VEND_CODE_M# AND MM017A.INVNR = #INVNR# AND (MM013B.STATE = '2' OR MM017A.DDATE >'0') AND MM013B.POTYPE = '' AND MM013B.KNTTP NOT IN ('P') -- 201210.11 김경수 GJ요청으로 일식외주 제외 ) AS MM013C LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT011 AS MM011 ON MM013C.MANDT = MM011.MANDT AND MM013C.MATNR = MM011.MATNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT025 AS MM025 ON MM013C.MANDT = MM025.MANDT AND SUBSTR(MM013C.POSID,1,9) = MM025.POSID AND MM025.PSTYPE = '02' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPPT027 AS PP027 ON MM013C.MANDT = PP027.MANDT AND MM013C.POSID = PP027.POSID AND PP027.ACTIV = '05' AND PP027.BLOCK = 'A' AND PP027.GUBUN = '01' WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY MM013C.MANDT, MM013C.POSID1, MM013C.UDATE, MM013C.MATNR ORDER BY MM013C.POSID1, MM013C.UDATE, MM013C.MATNR FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
